class_description:
Thrown when an application tries to use the Java new
 construct to instantiate an abstract class or an interface. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can
 only occur at run time if the definition of a class has
 incompatibly changed.

Methods.method_description: Constructs an InstantiationError with no detail  message.

Constructs an InstantiationError with the specified
 detail message.
